channel.title: algorithms on Progmatix 21
channel.description: Recent content in algorithms on Progmatix 21

item.title: Dynamic Programming: Knapsack Problem
item.description: Dynamic Programming is an algorithmic technique to solve constrained, combinatorial optimization problems. The Knapsack here is a metaphor for the constraint.

item.title: Comb Sort Cutaway
item.description: What is comb-sort? Comb-sort is a newer and modified form of bubble-sort. It seeks to improve the time-complexity of the traditional bubble-sort.

item.title: Bubble Sort Cutaway
item.description: What is bubble sort? Bubble sort is a relatively easy to understand and easy to implement algorithm. It was one of the earliest ones to be discovered.

item.title: Binary Search Cutaway
item.description: What is binary search? Binary search is an algorithm for searching elements from a sorted array. It far outweighs in benefits compared to a linear search method.
